title: Leeds in talks to sign Club Brugge left-back Laurens De Bock
description: Leeds United are in talks to sign Club Brugge left-back Laurens De Bock, according to Sky sources.
content: De Bock, who is also reportedly of interest to clubs in Italy, has been training with Brugge at their winter training camp in Spain over the last few days.He signed for Brugge for a few million euros in 2013 and has made 210 appearances for both them and previous club Lokeren in the Belgian top flight, scoring twice.The 25-year-old has only made six appearances for Club Brugge this season, however.According to reports in Belgium, the Championship club have already agreed personal terms with his representatives.On Thursday, Leeds confirmed the signing of Aapo Halme from Finnish side HJK Helsinki on a four-year contract for an undisclosed fee as their first January signing.
